articles.content: Panvel: A two-days free cervical cancer prevention vaccination camp started at Changu Kana Thakur College (CKT) at Khanda Colony in Panvel on April 8. Those who had taken the first dose in October 20… [+1765 chars]

articles.title: Eating Habits You Think Are Healthy But Could Be Harmful – 01/04/2022 - Play Crazy Game
articles.description: Everyone knows and it's true: eating vegetables, reducing sugar intake and exercising regularly are healthy habits. In fact, they are among the practices recommended by the WHO (World Health Organization) to increase the quality — and the expectation — of lif…
